info.name: Marine Tube Pokemon Showdown Style
info.description: Pokemon Showdown CSS featuring Marine Tube art. Predominantly blue with some black. The screenshot maximum size requirement makes it impossible to give a good representation of the css through image, but it's a very beautiful style.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 3.0
-Dark Mode Added.
-Teambuilder Fixed.
-Battle CSS improved.

Version 3.1
-Fixed an unexpected glitch when interacting with Azure CSS.
